name: Barn Busters
description:
You are a farmer whose rapscallions have escaped! Welcome to Barn Busters where your goal is to harvest your herd as fast as possible. In this physics-based tower defense you need to place down traps and obstacles to knock the animals off the map in as few rounds as possible. 

Controls

- W to move the camera forwards  

- S to move the camera backwards

- Left Click to select and place traps

- Right Click to deselect

- D to delete traps and a limited number of floor tiles

- Scroll wheel to rotate traps

- Left Alt to toggle first-person movement

Click the start round button in the bottom right to let the animals loose!
